Package com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes

Class SoloMiniGame

java.lang.Object
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.MiniGame
com.worldbiomusic.minigameworld.minigameframes.SoloMiniGame
public abstract class SoloMiniGame extends MiniGame
[Info]
- Minigame frame only 1 player can play
- solo play
- min player count: 1
- solo util methods

[Rule]
- nothing
